comments.text:
The TLS client certificate dialog should indicate whether the client certificate will be sent in the clear (during an initial negotiation) or encrypted (during a renegotiation with a server using the double-handshake technique described at https://tools.ietf.org/html/rfc4680#section-4).

See also bug 640745.
comments.raw_text:
The TLS client certificate dialog should indicate whether the client certificate will be sent in the clear (during an initial negotiation) or encrypted (during a renegotiation with a server using the double-handshake technique described at https://tools.ietf.org/html/rfc4680#section-4).

See also bug 640745.
